name: For The Cheese
description:
You are Mr. Cheese trapped in a sewer trying to reach a piece of cheese.

 The game records one key press at a time and it will run through the level in the order of the key presses, it was an ambitious task that we took on, but we had good fun making it and attempting it in the 3 hours. Unfortunately we couldn't make it work in HTML5.

We did about 1 hour of concepting the idea, and 4 hours; coding, creating the assets, making sound affects and doing 3 levels

All assets and sounds where made during the time except:

- Music

-Font

Controls:

The game uses W A D, the mouse jumps the way he is looking 

Please wait a second after the sequence has played or the input recording will bug

Made by: Joe Hamilton, Niall Colvin, Hugo Jones and Alex Dennis.

Excuse the sounds ;0
